global.name: docdok.health
global.update: Installing a new version of docdok...

clearStorage.title: Clear Storage
clearStorage.text: Do you want to clear the local storage? ie. if you want to connect with another user.

error.default: We are sorry but an error has occurred.
error.outdatedApp: Please click below to go to the appstore to update the docdok app. After updating, please close the app and then restart it.
error.internalServerError: We are sorry but an error has occurred.
error.deviceNotSupported: We are not supported your device yet
error.internetConnectionLost: Internet connection lost, please try to connect again

noDoctor.intro: Login for doctors to the docdok mobile app is not yet supported.
noDoctor.android: To login to docdok from the web, either remove the docdok mobile app or change App Link settings as follows: Settings > Apps > docdok > Set as Default > Go to supported URLs > choose "In other app"
noDoctor.ios: To login to docdok from the web remove the docdok mobile app.
noDoctor.beforeLink: Please login on the web at:

terms.title: Terms and conditions
terms.changed: Please accept the new terms and conditions
terms.checkboxLabel: I have read the terms of use and the privacy policy and I agree to them.
terms.checkboxAlert: Please confirm you have read agree to the terms and conditions
terms.consent: With my consent, I expressly agree to the storage of my health data in the EU and thus outside Switzerland.
terms.consentLink: More information can be found in the privacy policy section.

sessionHasExpired.title: Session has expired!
sessionHasExpired.body: Your session has expired, please login again.

notification.title: Notifications are off
notification.text: You won't receive any notifications from your doctor. Do you want to turn notifications on?

errors.getMe: Sorry, an error occurred while logging in docdok.health.
errors.retrieveTokens: Sorry, an error occurred during authentification. Please try again.
errors.getLimitedAccessToken: Sorry, an error occurred during authentification. Please try again.

composer.readOnly: This clinic has not enabled patient messaging

errors.sendMessage: Sorry, an error occurred while sending a message, please try again.
errors.loadMessages: Sorry, an error occurred while loading your messages.
errors.loadEarlierMessages: Sorry, an error occurred while loading your earlier messages.

warning.addPhoto: Not enable to upload your picture, please verify the size is under 1600x1600 pixels

videoinvitation.clickme: Click here to start the video conference

errors.fetchConversationsList: Sorry, an error occurred while loading your messages list.
errors.gotoChatSelect: Sorry, an error occurred while going to your chat message view.
errors.unselectConversation: Sorry, an error occurred while closing your last chat message view.

errors.enableNotifications: Sorry, an error occurred while enabling notifications.
errors.refreshToken: Sorry, an error occurred while process a refreshing of your authentication token.
errors.logOut: Sorry, an error occurred while logging out.
errors.loadDashboard: Sorry, an error occurred while loading your dashboard.
errors.receivedNotification: Sorry, an error occurred while receiving notification.
errors.gotoLockedDashboard: Sorry, an error occurred while logging out.

notices.receivedNotification: You have just received a new notification.
notices.receivedNotificationChat: You have just received a new message.
notices.receivedNotificationSurvey: You have just received a new survey.
notices.receivedNotificationSurveyReminder: You have just received a survey reminder.
notices.receivedNotificationAppointment: You have just received a new appointment reminder.

errors.fetchSurveys: Sorry, an error occurred while loading your surveys list.
errors.gotoSurveyWebView: Sorry, an error occurred while loading the details of your survey.

notificationslist.subtitle: Notifications
notificationslist.surveyReminder: This is a reminder to fill out your survey '{{content}}'

errors.fetchNotificationsList: Sorry, an error occurred while loading your notifications list.

appointmentslist.subtitle: Appointment
appointmentslist.contentScheduleItem: Time to make your next appointment. Tap here for recommendation details.

errors.fetchAppointmentsListAsync: Sorry, an error occurred while loading your appointment reminders

appointment.subtitle: Appointment Reminder
appointment.message: This is a reminder that you have an appointment with {{physician}} at {{hour}} {{calendar}}, {{month}} {{date}}, Please contact our office if you have any questions.
appointment.messageProxy: This is a reminder that {{name}} has an appointment with {{physician}} at {{hour}} {{calendar}}, {{month}} {{date}}, Please contact our office if you have any questions.

errors.fetchAppointment: Sorry, an error occurred while loading your appointment reminder

errors.updateAvatar: Sorry, an error occurred while updating your photo.

help.keepInfos: Please keep the following technical information for our support team

bookappointment.subtitle: Book appointment
bookappointment.urgentWarning: For urgent issues, please call the clinic directly

exportAppointment.needPermission: Please provide permission to access your calendar
exportAppointment.notSupported: Your mobile device is not yet supported

card.title: Office details
card.clinicMessage: The normal response time for our office is usually {{hours}} during normal business hours

clickPlusBtn: Click the plus button to add some new activities
clickPlusBtnToAdd: Click the plus button to add create new one.

scheduleAppointment.subtitle: Schedule Appointment
scheduleAppointment.message: It's time to make your next appointment at {{clinic}}. Tap "Book Appointment" below to request a date and time for your appointment.

card.title: Recommended Appointment
card.message: Make your appointment near this date:

appointmentConfirmation.subtitle: Appointment Confirmation
appointmentConfirmation.message: This is a confirmation that you have an appointment with {{physician}} at {{hour}} {{calendar}}, {{month}} {{date}}, Please contact our office if you have any questions.

validation.endTime: End time must be after start time

remove.title: Remove Event
remove.message: Are you sure you want to remove the event?

dataSharing: Please note that the information entered here may be viewed by the health professional(s) linked to you.
dontHaveActivity: You don't have any previous activities yet.
